recipes.title: Tomato Soup
recipes.preparation: Sauté onion and garlic, add tomatoes and broth. Cook until boiling. Add basil, salt, and pepper to taste.
recipes.description: A comforting tomato soup with a touch of fresh basil.

recipes.title: Chicken Tacos
recipes.preparation: Cook chicken and shred it. Assemble tacos with chicken, onion, cilantro, and salsa. Serve with lime.
recipes.description: Juicy chicken tacos with all the traditional Mexican flavors.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.preparation: Cook quinoa and let it cool. Mix with cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and avocado. Dress with lemon.
recipes.description: A healthy and hearty quinoa salad full of nutrients.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.preparation: Roll out the dough, add tomatoes and mozzarella. Bake until the crust is golden. Garnish with basil and olive oil.
recipes.description: The classic Margherita pizza with simple and authentic flavors.

recipes.title: Chicken and Rice
recipes.preparation: Brown the chicken, sauté onion and bell peppers, add rice, saffron, and peas. Cook until the rice is done.
recipes.description: A classic chicken and rice dish with irresistible flavors.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.preparation: Mix dry ingredients, add eggs, milk, and vanilla. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.
recipes.description: A fluffy and delicious chocolate cake that will satisfy your cravings.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.preparation: Chop lettuce, add grilled chicken, croutons, and parmesan cheese. Toss with Caesar dressing.
recipes.description: A classic Caesar salad with crispy croutons and juicy grilled chicken.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.preparation: Sauté mushrooms and onion, add rice and white wine. Cook with broth until creamy. Add parmesan cheese.
recipes.description: A creamy and comforting risotto with the goodness of mushrooms.

recipes.title: Protein Smoothie
recipes.preparation: Blend banana, spinach, protein powder, and almond milk in a blender. Garnish with almonds.
recipes.description: An energizing and nutritious smoothie to fuel your day with healthy proteins.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Burger
recipes.preparation: Mash chickpeas, mix with carrot, onion, and garlic. Form patties and cook. Serve on whole grain buns with avocado.
recipes.description: A delicious vegetarian burger packed with flavors and nutrients.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.preparation: Mix dry ingredients, add egg, milk, and melted butter. Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown.
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for a delightful breakfast.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.preparation: Cook spaghetti. Sauté pancetta, mix with eggs, cheese, and seasonings. Toss with cooked spaghetti.
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish loaded with flavor.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.preparation: Chop vegetables, add olives, feta cheese, and dress with olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
recipes.description: A refreshing salad with Mediterranean flavors.

recipes.title: Omelette
recipes.preparation: Whisk eggs, milk, cheese, salt, and pepper. Cook in a pan with melted butter until set.
recipes.description: A quick and delicious way to start your morning.

recipes.title: Stir-Fried Vegetables
recipes.preparation: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce in a hot pan with sesame oil.
recipes.description: A colorful and healthy mix of stir-fried veggies.

recipes.title: Fruit Salad
recipes.preparation: Mix fruits in a bowl. Add a drizzle of honey or lime juice if desired.
recipes.description: A refreshing and sweet treat made with fresh fruits.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.preparation: Assemble sandwich with cheese between bread slices. Grill in a buttered pan until golden brown.
recipes.description: A classic and comforting cheesy delight.

recipes.title: Beef Stir-Fry
recipes.preparation: Coat beef with cornstarch, stir-fry with vegetables, garlic, and ginger. Add soy sauce while cooking.
recipes.description: A savory and satisfying beef stir-fry.

recipes.title: Banana Bread
recipes.preparation: Mash bananas, mix with other ingredients. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.
recipes.description: A moist and flavorful homemade banana bread.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.preparation: Mash avocados with lemon juice, spread on toast. Top with tomatoes, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.
recipes.description: A simple yet delicious breakfast option.
